snippet: I'll Have Another drew Post 11 and was installed as the morning-line favorite when post positions were drawn Wednesday morning at Belmont Park for the 144th running of the Belmont Stakes.
abstract: I'll Have Another drew Post 11 and was installed as the morning-line favorite when post positions were drawn Wednesday morning at Belmont Park for the 144th running of the Belmont Stakes.

headline.main: No Surprise: I'll Have Another Is Morning-Line Favorite for Belmont
